title: Data (Use and Access) Act 2025
summary: An Act to make provision about access to customer data and business data; to regulate the processing and sharing of information relating to identifiable individuals; to establish the Information Commission; to make provision about privacy, electronic communications, copyright-protected works, and the development of artificial intelligence systems; and for connected purposes.

title: The National Security and Investment Act 2021 (Notifiable Acquisition) (Specification of Qualifying Entities) Regulations 2021
summary: These Regulations specify descriptions of qualifying entities for the purposes of mandatory notification under the National Security and Investment Act 2021.

title: Directive (EU) 2019/1024 on open data and the re-use of public sector information
summary: Directive governing access to and re-use of public sector information across the European Union.
ai_relevance: Establishes rules on access to and re-use of public sector data, which may be used as input for artificial intelligence systems.

title: Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council (UK GDPR)
summary: This Regulation governs the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data, including provisions on automated processing and automated decision-making.
relevance_to_automation: Includes provisions related to automated processing and automated decision-making involving personal data.
relevance_to_ai: Addresses automated processing and automated decision-making, which may include artificial intelligence systems that process personal data.

title: The Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018 (Commencement No. 1) Regulations 2021
summary: These Regulations bring into force provisions of the Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018, including sections establishing a legal framework for identifying and regulating automated vehicles.
relevance_to_automation: Brings into force statutory provisions related to the identification and regulation of automated vehicles.
relevance_to_ai: Establishes a legal framework concerning automated vehicles; artificial intelligence relevance is not explicitly specified.

title: The Sheep Carcase (Classification and Price Reporting) (Scotland) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations mandate classification and price reporting of sheep carcases, including provisions that specifically regulate automated classification methods.
relevance_to_automation: Includes provisions regulating the use of automated classification methods for sheep carcases.
relevance_to_ai: Automated classification methods are referenced; relevance to artificial intelligence is not explicitly specified.

title: The Sheep Carcase (Classification and Price Reporting) (England) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations require mandatory classification and price reporting of sheep carcases by approved slaughterhouses, including regulated classification systems.
relevance_to_automation: Regulated classification systems are referenced; automation is not explicitly specified.

title: The Sheep Carcass (Classification and Price Reporting) (Wales) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations mandate classification and price reporting of sheep carcasses by larger slaughterhouses, including classification mechanisms.
relevance_to_automation: Classification mechanisms are referenced; automation is not explicitly specified.

title: Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/683
summary: This Regulation establishes administrative and market surveillance requirements for motor vehicles and related systems, including approval and compliance mechanisms.

title: Regulation (EU) 2018/1240 establishing a European Travel Information and Authorisation System (ETIAS)
summary: This Regulation establishes ETIAS, an automated system for assessing travel authorisation applications and performing automated risk screening.
relevance_to_automation: Establishes an automated system for application assessment and automated risk screening.

title: The Road Vehicles (Construction and Use) (Automated Vehicles) Order 2022
summary: This Order modifies vehicle construction and use rules to permit visual displays when a vehicle is operating in automated mode under the Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018.
relevance_to_automation: Permits specific vehicle features when operating in automated mode under an automated vehicle legal framework.

title: Data Protection Act 2018
summary: This Act regulates the processing of personal data, including provisions governing automated decision-making and profiling.
relevance_to_automation: Includes provisions governing automated decision-making and profiling in the context of personal data processing.
relevance_to_ai: Addresses automated decision-making and profiling, which may involve artificial intelligence systems processing personal data.

title: The Automated Vehicles Act 2024 (Commencement No. 1) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations bring into force specified provisions of the Automated Vehicles Act 2024, establishing the legal framework for automated vehicles.
relevance_to_automation: Brings into force statutory provisions establishing a legal framework for automated vehicles.
